ComicInfo.Summary:
The horror continues! Frankenstein continues his spree of violence through New York, but there is someone who will stop at nothing to save the monster's life from Liesel Van Helsing. Helsing faces off with one of her own... and when Angelica Blackstone, the Hellchild, comes into the mix, whose side will she be on?

ComicInfo.Title: Lost In Darkness and Distance
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Arif Prianto,David Lorenzo Riveiro,Ivan Nunes,Jason Metcalf,Joe Pekar,Jorge Alberto Cortes,Mike Krome,Paolo Pantalena,Urszula Mos
